title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the core CLI and server to pull, run, and manage large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, published to npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API, published to PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama models, packaged as a lightweight Docker container.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom component exposing Ollama models as conversation agents.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM library for Ollama providing Kotlin & Java builders for chat and generate calls.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama API with enhanced REPL features.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension adding local AI code suggestions powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and both sync/async APIs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models to Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Curated docker-compose stacks combining Ollama with web UIs, monitoring, and GPU support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI text generation, summarization, and translation via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for integrating Ollama into mobile and desktop apps.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform modules for provisioning GPU-enabled cloud instances with Ollama pre-installed.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template for building Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipelines with Ollama and Chroma.

title: ollama-express
summary: Lightweight Express.js proxy adding CORS, auth, and request queuing to Ollama’s API.
